title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 4-1.11 - Secondhand boilers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 4-1.11 - Secondhand boilers

State Regulations

The installation of boiler components which were used by
a previous owner is prohibited unless after such inspection and tests as he may
deem necessary a certified boiler inspector shall find such components safe for
the use intended. On request of the owner, the certified boiler inspector shall
state such finding in a signed and dated writing delivered to the
owner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
4-1.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
